meanings.meaning_en_US: At a short distance away.

examples.sentence: The store is [near] my house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那家店在我家附近。

examples.sentence: Stay [near] me to avoid getting lost.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 靠近我，以避免迷路。

examples.sentence: [Near] the end of the street, you'll find the library.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在街道的盡頭附近，你會找到圖書館。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Characterized by sunshine; bright and clear.

examples.sentence: It was a [sunny] day perfect for a picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那是個適合野餐的陽光明媚的日子

examples.sentence: We love going to the beach on [sunny] weekends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們喜歡在陽光明媚的週末去海灘

examples.sentence: The forecast says it will be [sunny] all week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 天氣預報說這一周都會是陽光明媚的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Unable to see; lacking the sense of sight.

examples.sentence: The man was born [blind].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那個人天生失明。

examples.sentence: She is [blind] to the dangers around her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對周圍的危險視而不見。

examples.sentence: The [blind] dog navigated the room carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那隻失明的狗小心翼翼地在房間裡走動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Perhaps; it is possible.

examples.sentence: I will [maybe] go to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可能會去派對

examples.sentence: [Maybe] we can try again tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 或許我們明天可以再試一次

examples.sentence: She said she would [maybe] call later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她說她可能稍後會打電話

meanings.meaning_en_US: A picture made using a camera.

examples.sentence: I took a beautiful [photo] at the beach.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在海灘拍了一張美麗的照片。

examples.sentence: She shared the [photo] on social media.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在社交媒體上分享了照片。

examples.sentence: He has a collection of old [photos].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他收藏了一些舊照片。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A female parent.

examples.sentence: My [mother] makes the best cookies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我媽媽做的餅乾最好吃。

examples.sentence: She is a very caring [mother].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位非常關心孩子的母親。

examples.sentence: Every year, we celebrate [Mother]'s Day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每年我們都慶祝母親節。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To give food to someone or something.

examples.sentence: I need to [feed] the dog before I leave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要在離開之前餵狗。

examples.sentence: We [feed] the birds every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們每天早上餵鳥。

examples.sentence: He likes to [feed] the hungry children in the village.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡餵村裡饑餓的孩子們。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To contact someone by phone.

examples.sentence: Please [call] me when you arrive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在你到達時打電話給我。

examples.sentence: She will [call] you back shortly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會很快回你的電話。

examples.sentence: He decided to [call] his friend for advice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定打電話給朋友尋求建議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An instance or example of a particular situation.

examples.sentence: In this [case], we should take action.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在這種情況下，我們應該採取行動。

examples.sentence: Each [case] presented unique challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個案例都帶來獨特的挑戰。

examples.sentence: The lawyer reviewed the [case] thoroughly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 律師徹底審查了這個案例。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A container or protective covering.

examples.sentence: He put the phone in its [case].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把手機放進它的保護殼裡。

examples.sentence: The book [case] held many rare editions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書架上有許多稀有版次。

examples.sentence: She bought a [case] for her new laptop.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的新筆記本電腦買了一個保護殼。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A series of thoughts, images, or emotions occurring during sleep.

examples.sentence: I had a strange [dream] last night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨晚做了個奇怪的[夢]。

examples.sentence: Her [dream] is to travel the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的[夢]是環遊世界。

examples.sentence: He remembered the details of his [dream].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他記得他[夢]的細節。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to or concerning the people as a whole.

examples.sentence: The park is open to the [public].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個公園對公眾開放

examples.sentence: She works in a [public] library.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在一個公共圖書館工作

examples.sentence: They held a [public] meeting to discuss community issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們舉行了一個公共會議來討論社區問題

meanings.meaning_en_US: A male child in relation to his parents.

examples.sentence: My [son] loves playing soccer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的兒子喜歡踢足球。

examples.sentence: He is a proud [son] of his family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一個以家庭為榮的兒子。

examples.sentence: They have one [son] and two daughters.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們有一個兒子和兩個女兒。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of poor quality; unpleasant.

examples.sentence: This food tastes [bad].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這食物的味道很差。

examples.sentence: He has a [bad] habit of being late.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有個遲到的壞習慣。

examples.sentence: It's a [bad] idea to skip class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 翹課是一個不好的主意。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A settled or regular tendency or practice, especially one that is hard to give up.

examples.sentence: He has a habit of reading before bed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在睡前有閱讀的習慣

examples.sentence: Breaking a bad [habit] can be difficult.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 打破壞習慣可能很困難

examples.sentence: She developed a habit of jogging every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她養成了每天早上慢跑的習慣

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of time lasting approximately 30 days.

examples.sentence: Her birthday is in the next [month].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的生日在下個月份。

examples.sentence: Each [month] has its own significance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個月份都有其特殊意義。

examples.sentence: We meet once a [month].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們每個月見一次。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Equally distant from the extremes; central.

examples.sentence: The [middle] of the book is very exciting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 書的中間部分非常精彩。

examples.sentence: He stood in the [middle] of the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他站在房間的中間。

examples.sentence: We met in the [middle] of the park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在公園的中間見面。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The central point or position.

examples.sentence: Put the table in the [middle] of the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 把桌子放在房間的中間。

examples.sentence: The [middle] of the cake is filled with cream.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蛋糕的中間填滿了奶油。

examples.sentence: They stood in the [middle] of the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們站在人群的中間。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Belonging to oneself or itself.

examples.sentence: She wants to have her [own] business.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想要擁有自己的生意。

examples.sentence: He takes pride in his [own] achievements.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對自己的成就感到自豪。

examples.sentence: Each child has their [own] toys.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個孩子都有自己的玩具。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large mammal with a trunk, native to Africa and Asia.

examples.sentence: The [elephant] marched through the savanna.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大象行軍穿越草原。

examples.sentence: An [elephant] can weigh several tons.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一頭大象可以重達幾噸。

examples.sentence: He saw an [elephant] at the zoo.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在動物園看到一頭大象。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A mineral substance used to season food and preserve it.

examples.sentence: She added a pinch of [salt] to the soup.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在湯裡加了一撮鹽

examples.sentence: Too much [salt] can be harmful to health.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 過多的鹽對健康有害

examples.sentence: Sprinkle [salt] on the steak before grilling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在烤牛排之前撒鹽

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large body of saltwater that is smaller than an ocean and is partially enclosed by land.

examples.sentence: The [sea] is calm today.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天海面平靜

examples.sentence: They went swimming in the [sea].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在海裡游泳

examples.sentence: The [sea] is home to many creatures.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海裡是許多生物的家
